title: FR-022: Visual Performance Safeguards
description:
**Goal:** App remains usable on low-performance devices
**Success Definition:** Heavy animations degrade gracefully
**Dependencies:** FR-021

## Scope
- Detect reduced motion preference
- Automatically downgrade: Confetti glitch intensity, 3D rotation depth, Continuous animations (pause when offscreen)
- Display subtle 'Performance Mode' indicator when active

## UI States
- **Loading:** Performance check message hidden
- **Error:** Manual 'Reduce Effects' toggle appears

## UAT
- Enable reduced motion in OS → Reload app → animations simplified
- **Negative:** Full effects remain on capable devices
- **Cross-Device:** Applies on mobile browsers

## Out of Scope
User-configurable quality presets

Validate persisted charm data loaded from storage (runtime schema)
description:
**Goal:** Validate charm data loaded from localStorage to prevent crashes from corrupted/malformed data

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Define expected charm schema (id, name, icon, power, points)
- Validate each field type at runtime on load
- Reject invalid data gracefully (use empty state, log warning)
- App never crashes on corrupted localStorage

**Implementation Notes:**
- Use Zod or manual validation
- Apply in CharmContext during initialization
- Return default empty array if validation fails

**Test Plan:**
- Inject malformed JSON in localStorage key
- Verify app loads with empty charm state
- Verify console warning logged

title: Add reduced-motion support (respect prefers-reduced-motion)
description:
**Goal:** Respect user's `prefers-reduced-motion` OS setting

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Detect reduced-motion preference via CSS media query or `matchMedia`

title: FR-021: Sound Settings & Global Mute Control
description:
**Goal:** User can control audio playback across the experience
**Success Definition:** User can mute/unmute all sounds and setting applies immediately
**Dependencies:** FR-020

## System Boundary Matrix
- **Primary System:** Web UI
- **Interfaces:** Web Audio API
- **Data Contract Changes:** Add session-based audio preference

## Scope
- Add global sound control icon accessible from all screens
- Provide toggle states: Sound ON / Sound OFF
- Apply mute state to: Ringtone, Connection sound, Shutter, CD burn completion, Celebration/confetti sounds

## UI States
- **Loading:** Icon disabled briefly on toggle
- **Error:** Audio unavailable → icon shows muted with tooltip

## UAT
- Toggle sound off → trigger any sound event → no audio plays
- Toggle sound on → sounds resume
- **Negative:** Rapid toggles don't desync state
- **Cross-Device:** Works with mobile hardware mute respected

## Out of Scope
Per-sound volume sliders

title: Add cleanup for useCharmFlip timeout
description:
**Problem:** `useCharmFlip` hook uses `setTimeout` without cleanup on unmount, causing potential memory leaks and state updates on unmounted components.

**Why now:** P1 bug that can cause React warnings and unpredictable behavior.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Timeout is cleared when component unmounts
- No React state-update-on-unmounted-component warnings

**Implementation Notes:**
- Add cleanup function in useEffect return
- Store timeout ID in ref

**Test Plan:**
- Mount/unmount component rapidly
- Verify no console warnings

title: Prevent useCamera effect from restarting due to startCamera identity changes
description:
**Problem:** `useCamera` effect reruns when `startCamera` function reference changes on each render, causing camera to restart unnecessarily.

**Why now:** P1 bug affecting user experience - camera view flickers/restarts.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Camera starts once and stays stable
- No unnecessary MediaStream recreation
- Effect only reruns when truly needed

**Implementation Notes:**
- Use `useCallback` for `startCamera` with stable dependencies
- Consider extracting camera init to ref-based pattern

**Test Plan:**
- Open camcorder screen
- Verify camera starts once without flicker
- Navigate away and back, verify clean restart

description:

**Solution:** Added 'one award per reason' policy in CharmContext by tracking awarded reasons in a persisted Set. `addBonusPoints(amount, reason)` no-ops if reason already awarded. Set persists to localStorage.

- src/components/wallet/CharmCard.tsx, sms/GiftCardModal.tsx, screens/CamcorderScreen.tsx

title: Make localStorage access SSR/test-safe in CharmContext.tsx
description:
**Problem:** Crashes in SSR/test environments where window/localStorage unavailable, plus crashes on corrupted storage values.

**Solution:** Centralized storage access behind getItem/setItem helpers that return fallbacks when window undefined, wrap in try/catch, and JSON-parse safely with fallback on invalid JSON.

**Files Changed:**
- src/lib/storage.ts (SSR-safe guards + safe JSON handling)
- src/context/CharmContext.tsx (use storage helpers)
